headline.main: NAZIS SAID TO ASK VICHY FOR TRANSIT; Petain Reported Balking Plan to Send Troops Into Spain for Gibraltar Attack NAZIS SAID TO ASK VICHY FOR TRANSIT

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, May 2 -- The demand that France, as a gesture of "solidarity" and in token of her good-will toward Germany, permit the free transit of German troops to Spain through unoccupied France was made to the Vichy Government four days ago, according to information received here this evening.
abstract: Berne hears Germany sought troop transit permit from Vichy Govt and use of Marseilles and northern Tunisia as operations base; Petain reptd opposed

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
